description: BBQ POD is your ultimate destination for all things barbecue. Whether you're a seasoned pitmaster or just starting out, we've got you covered with delicious recipes, expert tips, and the latest BBQ news. Stay tuned for mouthwatering content that will ignite your passion for grilling!
brochureTitle: Discover the BBQ Pod Spain Range
brochureDescription: Receive our full brochure by email and explore all models, features and finishes at your own pace.
footerText: Join 100+ satisfied UK families who transformed their gardens with BBQ Pods
faqsSubtitle: Join customers who have transformed their outdoor spaces into premium places to cook, host and relax
faq1Answer: From order confirmation, delivery and installation typically take up to 16 weeks. In quieter periods this can be closer to 14 weeks, depending on production schedules and your chosen specification. We'll always confirm lead times before securing your order.
faq2Answer: All BBQ Pods come with a 10-year structural warranty and a 2-year warranty on appliances, as detailed in our brochure. This covers normal residential use and manufacturing defects.
faq3Answer: The pod must be installed on solid, level ground capable of supporting its weight. An external electrical socket is required, along with a water supply and waste connection if a sink is included. Due to the weight of the units, suitable access for delivery and crane placement is also necessary.
faq4Question: Can the BBQ Pod be used year-round?
faq4Answer: Yes. BBQ Pods are designed for outdoor living in the Spanish climate. When closed, the interior remains clean and protected from dust and rain. When open, integrated shading and lighting allow comfortable outdoor cooking throughout the year.
faq5Question: How do I choose the right model?
faq5Answer: The right model depends on your available space, how you plan to use the pod, and your preferred features. We're happy to advise and can prepare a visualisation to help you choose with confidence.
faq6Answer: Maintenance is simple and minimal. Regular cleaning of cooking surfaces and occasional care of stainless-steel areas will keep your BBQ Pod performing and looking its best.
faq7Question: Can I customise the pod after ordering?
faq7Answer: All major customisation is completed before production begins. Once an order is confirmed, changes are limited, so we'll guide you through all options carefully to ensure everything is right from the start.
faq8Answer: Speak with our team for personalised advice on selecting the right BBQ Pod for your home.
sectionSubtitle: Únete a cientos de clientes satisfechos que han transformado sus jardines en espacios de ocio exterior de lujo.
testimonial1Text: Usamos el Pinnacle casi todos los fines de semana. Cocinar, comer y simplemente estar fuera es más fácil porque todo está ya dispuesto. Ha cambiado cómo utilizamos nuestro jardín sin parecer excesivo
testimonial2Text: El Prime nos pareció el equilibrio perfecto. Suficientemente grande para recibir, pero no masivo. Todo se siente sólido y bien acabado, y la instalación fue sencilla.
testimonial3Text: Queríamos algo abierto en lugar de totalmente cerrado, y el Aero nos va perfecto. El toldo es útil para la sombra y sigue pareciendo auténtica cocina al aire libre.
testimonial4Text: Nuestro espacio es bastante pequeño, así que nos preocupaba que pudiera sentirse estrecho. El Core encaja realmente bien y no parece un compromiso en absoluto.
testimonial5Text: Cocino mucho, así que el Apex tenía sentido para mí. El espacio de trabajo extra y la parrilla más grande se notan a diario. Se siente práctico, no solo para la apariencia.
testimonial6Text: Todo el proceso fue tranquilo y claro. Sin presión, sin prisas. El pod se ve exactamente como esperábamos y estamos muy contentos con cómo resultó.
curatedSelectionSubtitle: Explore a handpicked preview of exterior colours, interior finishes, wood transfers and worktop options. Every BBQ Pod is made to order, with further customisation available.
featuresSectionTitle: A New Standard for Outdoor Cooking
featuresSectionSubtitle: Designed for life outdoors in Spain, our BBQ Pods are permanent, fully integrated outdoor kitchens - not temporary garden structures. Built with commercial-grade materials to handle sun, heat and year-round use, every pod is supported locally and protected by comprehensive manufacturer warranties.
feature1Description: Designed for long-term outdoor use, with 6-layer insulated door panels and stainless-steel construction. Commercial-grade materials deliver strength, durability and reliable performance for decades.
feature2Description: BBQ Pod Spain focuses exclusively on premium outdoor kitchens, combining carefully selected manufacturing partners with hands-on project management to deliver exceptional results from order to installation
feature3Description: Fully assembled delivery and professional installation across mainland Spain. No DIY required, your BBQ Pod arrives ready to use, typically around 16 weeks from deposit.
feature4Description: High-performance appliances including grills, integrated refrigeration and sealed, weather-resistant electronics. Specified for continuous outdoor use and built to professional kitchen standards.
feature5Description: Select from 4 powder-coated exterior colours, 20 interior finishes and a choice of worktop options. Configure a BBQ Pod that fits seamlessly into your outdoor space.
feature6Description: Designed to handle sun, heat, dust and rain, our BBQ Pods remain clean and protected when closed. Open the pod and enjoy shaded, comfortable outdoor cooking throughout the year.
outdoorKitchensTitle: Find the Right BBQ Pod for Your Space
outdoorKitchensSubtitle: Whether you're working with a smaller garden or a larger outdoor area, every model is engineered with commercial-grade materials, stainless-steel construction and high-quality appliances.
comparisonTableSubtitle: Our premium outdoor kitchen range at a glance
pinnacleTableKeyFeature: Full-spec outdoor kitchen with motorised roof and luxury features
brochureModalTitle: Your Brochure Is on Its Way
brochureModalParagraph1: Thanks for your interest in BBQ Pod Spain.
brochureModalParagraph2: We've just sent you our full brochure in your chosen language, including models, specifications and pricing guidance to your email address.
brochureModalParagraph3: Take your time exploring the range. If you'd like help choosing the right BBQ Pod or visualising it in your space, we're here when you're ready.
brochureModalNote: If you don't see the email within a few minutes, please check your spam folder.
ctaSubtitle: Speak with our team for personalised advice on selecting the right BBQ Pod for your home.
footerCopyright: © 2026 BBQ Pod Spain SL. All rights reserved.
comingSoonDescription: We're working hard to bring you something amazing. Stay tuned!
productsBannerDescription1: Discover our range of premium outdoor kitchen pods, designed for life outdoors in Spain and built for long-term use. Each BBQ Pod is constructed using commercial-grade stainless steel and high-quality materials throughout, combining refined design, performance and durability.
productsBannerDescription2: Whether you're upgrading your outdoor entertaining space or creating a dedicated cooking area in your garden or terrace, our five BBQ Pod models offer tailored solutions — from compact layouts to fully equipped, all-season outdoor kitchens
exteriorPodFrameSubtitle: Powder-coated colour options for the pod structure.
interiorCabinetsWoodSubtitle: Wood-effect finishes for a warmer interior feel.
countertopSinteredStoneSubtitle: Premium stone-effect worktop surfaces. For an additional 400 €
customizeYourPodSubtitle: Choose your finishes and materials to suit your space and style.
workcoreDescriptionOne: The Core is designed for smaller gardens and terraces, offering a refined outdoor cooking setup in a compact footprint. It includes everything needed for outdoor cooking and entertaining, built to the same high standard as the rest of the BBQ Pod range.
workcoreDescriptionTwo: Ideal for couples or small families, the Core makes it easy to cook, eat and spend time outdoors without taking over your space.
workcoreHeadingOneDescription: Everything you need for comfortable, everyday outdoor cooking thoughtfully laid out in a compact format and finished to the same standard as the rest of the BBQ Pod range.
workcorePointText: The Core can be configured with different front door styles, depending on your space and how you plan to use the pod:
workcorePointOneDescription: Opens upwards to provide overhead shade while cooking and offers the highest level of protection from sun, rain and dust when closed.
workcorePointTwoHeading: Roller style door (fabric mesh or metal)
workcorePointTwoDescription: A space efficient option where a lift up door isn't practical. Provides quick access and helps reduce exposure when closed, while maintaining an open, lightweight feel when in use.
workcorePointTwoDescriptionTwo: Both options are designed to keep the interior tidy and protected when not in use, while remaining practical and comfortable during cooking.
workcoreTechnicalDescription: Designed for performance and durability outdoors.
workcoreDescriptionFour: The Core is made for everyday outdoor cooking, relaxed entertaining and year-round use, all in a refined, space efficient design.
workcoreDescriptionTechnicalOverview: Complete specification diagram with all features labeled
workcoreSpecificationFour: Stainless steel sink with pull-out tap
workcoreConstructionMaterialsOne: SUS304 commercial grade stainless steel structure
workcoreConstructionMaterialsTwo: Stainless steel internal cabinetry and work surfaces
workcoreConstructionMaterialsThree: UV resistant powder coated exterior panels
workkoreFrontDoorSystemTwo: Electrically operated door system with remote control
workcoreFinishOptionsTwo: Interior cabinet finishes (solid colour or wood-grain transfer)
workcoreFinishOptionsThree: Stainless steel or sintered stone worktop options
